dillon.gameAPI.event.EEvent

    Package Description
    dillon.gameAPI.event  

    • Uses of EEvent in dillon.gameAPI.event

      Classes in dillon.gameAPI.event with type parameters of type EEvent 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  EEHandler<T extends EEvent>
      This is a handler for any engine event that comes by.
      Subclasses of EEvent in dillon.gameAPI.event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KeyEngineEvent
      Event for when a key is pressed.
      class  MouseEngineEvent
      Fires when a mouse event occurs.
      class  NetworkEvent
      Fires when a network-related event occurs.
      class  PromptEvent
      Fires when a prompt is answered.
      class  RenderEvent
      Fires to indicate that a rendering event should take place.
      class  ShutdownEvent
      Indicates a shutdown of the engine.
      class  TickEvent
      Indicates when everything should tick.
      Methods in dillon.gameAPI.event with parameters of type EEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void EventSystem.broadcastMessage(EEvent e)
      This will broadcast a message through all handlers.
      void EEHandler.handle(EEvent T)
      Fires when an event occurs depending on your situation.
      Method parameters in dillon.gameAPI.event with type arguments of type EEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void EventSystem.addHandler(EEHandler<? extends EEvent> h)
      Adds a handler to get events.
      static void EventSystem.removeHandler(EEHandler<? extends EEvent> h)
      Removes the handler.
